name: Tuna Sandwich
description: 100% wild caught tuna blended with creamy mayo then topped with your choice of crisp, fresh veggies.

name: Veggie Delite Sandwich
description: A fresh combination of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and onions. A great meatless option.

name: The Hotshot Italiano
description: Artisan Italian bread is topped with spicy pepperoni, Genoa salami, 2x provolone cheese, jalapeño peppers, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, and an explosive finish of our MVP Parmesan Vinaigrette®.

name: Oven Roasted Turkey Sandwich
description: It’s full of flavor and made to order with your choice of crisp veggies, melted American cheese, served on our freshly baked, Hearty Multigrain bread.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Freshly baked, soft, and chewy chocolate chip cookie.
